00124         // start up the app.
00125         Startup( lpCmdLine );
00126 
00127         // load the test scene.
00128         tstring errors;
00129 //      gGrScene->LoadScene( "data/ubertest", errors );
00130         gGrScene->LoadScene( "data/metalroom", errors );
00131 
00132         // TODO: compress and decompress geometry.
00133 //      T_CompressGeometryTest(  );
00134 
00135         // create the camera.
00136         GrCamera camera( MVec3( 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f ), MMat3x3(), DegToRad( 70.0f ), 100.0f, 1.0f );
00137 
00138         // hide the cursor.
00139         ShowCursor( FALSE );
00140 
00141         // set the timer to 1ms precision.
00142         timeBeginPeriod( 1U );
00143 
00144         // useful variables.
00145         MMat3x3 rotX;
00146         MMat3x3 rotY;
00147         MMat3x3 cameraRot;
00148         MVec3 cameraPos;
00149         MSG msg;
00150         RECT rect;
00151 
00152         // mouse orientation.
00153         float mouseRotX = 0.0f;
00154         float mouseRotY = 0.0f;
00155         float aspect = 1.0f;
00156 
00157         // run.
00158         unsigned int time = timeGetTime();
00159         bool running = true;
00160         while ( running )
00161         {
00162                 int mouseDeltaX = 0;
00163                 int mouseDeltaY = 0;
00164                 if ( GetFocus() == _window )
00165                 {
00166                         // calculate the center-screen coordinate for the mouse.
00167                         GetWindowRect( _window, &rect );
00168                         int mouseCenterX = ( rect.right - rect.left ) / 2;
00169                         int mouseCenterY = ( rect.bottom - rect.top ) / 2;
00170 
00171                         // get the mouse cursor's current position.
00172                         POINT mousePos;
00173                         GetCursorPos( &mousePos );
00174 
00175                         // calculate the mouse deltas.
00176                         mouseDeltaX = mousePos.x - mouseCenterX;
00177                         mouseDeltaY = mousePos.y - mouseCenterY;
00178 
00179                         // re-center the mouse cursor.
00180                         SetCursorPos( mouseCenterX, mouseCenterY );
00181 
00182                         // calculate the aspect ratio.
00183                         GetClientRect( _window, &rect );
00184                         aspect = ( float )rect.right / ( float )rect.bottom;
00185                 }
00186 
00187                 // check to see if there are any messages waiting.
00188                 while ( PeekMessage( &msg, NULL, 0, 0, PM_NOREMOVE ) )
00189                 {
00190                         // handle the current message.
00191                         if ( GetMessage( &msg, NULL, 0, 0 ) != TRUE )
00192                         {
00193                                 running = false;
00194                                 break;
00195                         }
00196                         TranslateMessage( &msg );
00197                         DispatchMessage( &msg );
00198                 }
00199 
00200                 // calculate the time.
00201                 unsigned int delta = time;
00202                 time = timeGetTime();
00203                 delta = time - delta;
00204 
00205                 // build the camera's rotation.
00206                 if ( mouseDeltaY != 0 )
00207                         mouseRotX -= ( float )mouseDeltaY / 10.0f;
00208                 if ( mouseDeltaX != 0 )
00209                         mouseRotY -= ( float )mouseDeltaX / 10.0f;
00210                 rotX.MakeXRotation( DegToRad( mouseRotX ) );
00211                 rotY.MakeYRotation( DegToRad( mouseRotY ) );
00212                 cameraRot = rotY * rotX;
00213 
00214                 // determine the camera's position.
00215                 float moveDist = 10.0f * delta / 1000.0f;               // 5 units per second.
00216                 if ( _keyDown & KEY_MOVE_FORWARD )
00217                         cameraPos -= moveDist * cameraRot.GetCol( 2 );
00218                 if ( _keyDown & KEY_MOVE_BACKWARD )
00219                         cameraPos += moveDist * cameraRot.GetCol( 2 );
00220                 if ( _keyDown & KEY_MOVE_LEFT )
00221                         cameraPos -= moveDist * cameraRot.GetCol( 0 );
00222                 if ( _keyDown & KEY_MOVE_RIGHT )
00223                         cameraPos += moveDist * cameraRot.GetCol( 0 );
00224 
00225                 // apply the transform to the camera.
00226                 camera.SetRot( cameraRot );
00227                 camera.SetPos( cameraPos );
00228                 camera.SetProjAspectRatio( aspect );
00229 
00230                 // update the engine
00231                 gGrSubsys->Update( delta, delta );
00232                 gGrSubsys->Render( &camera );
00233 
00234                 // present the contents of the backbuffer.
00235                 SwapBuffers( _windowDC );
00236         }
00237 
00238         // end 1ms timer precision.
00239         timeEndPeriod( 1U );
00240 
00241         // test geometry compression.
00242 //      TestGeometryCompression();
00243 
00244         // shut down.
00245         Shutdown();
00246 
00247         // return success.
00248         return 0;
00249 }

00251 //----------------------------------------------------------
00252 LRESULT
00253 CALLBACK
00254 WindowProc( HWND window, UINT message, WPARAM wparam, LPARAM lparam )
00255 {
00256         switch ( message )
00257         {
00258         case WM_KEYDOWN:
00259                 if ( wparam == VK_ESCAPE )
00260                         PostQuitMessage( 0 );
00261                 else
00262                         _keyDown |= GetKeyFlag( ( unsigned int )wparam );
00263                 break;
00264 
00265         case WM_KEYUP:
00266                 _keyDown &= ~GetKeyFlag( ( unsigned int )wparam );
00267                 break;
00268         }
00269         return DefWindowProc( window, message, wparam, lparam );
00270 }

00273 void
00274 Startup( const char* rootPath, unsigned int width, unsigned int height )
00275 {
00276         // get the instance.
00277         _instance = GetModuleHandle( NULL );
00278 
00279         // fill out the window class.
00280         WNDCLASS wc;
00281         wc.style                        = CS_HREDRAW | CS_VREDRAW | CS_OWNDC;
00282         wc.lpfnWndProc          = WindowProc;
00283         wc.cbClsExtra           = 0;
00284         wc.cbWndExtra           = 0;
00285         wc.hInstance            = _instance;
00286         wc.hIcon                        = LoadIcon( NULL, IDI_WINLOGO );
00287         wc.hCursor                      = LoadCursor( NULL, IDC_ARROW );
00288         wc.hbrBackground        = NULL;
00289         wc.lpszMenuName         = NULL;
00290         wc.lpszClassName        = WINDOW_CLASS_NAME;
00291         RegisterClass( &wc );
00292 
00293         // create the window.
00294         RECT wndRect;
00295         wndRect.left = 0;
00296         wndRect.right = width;
00297         wndRect.top = 0;
00298         wndRect.bottom = height;
00299         AdjustWindowRect( &wndRect, WS_OVERLAPPEDWINDOW & ~WS_OVERLAPPED, FALSE );
00300         ::_window = CreateWindow( WINDOW_CLASS_NAME, WINDOW_TITLE, WS_CLIPSIBLINGS | WS_CLIPCHILDREN |  WS_OVERLAPPEDWINDOW,
00301                                                           0, 0, wndRect.right - wndRect.left, wndRect.bottom - wndRect.top,
00302                                                           NULL, NULL, _instance, NULL );
00303 
00304         // initialize OpenGL.
00305         PIXELFORMATDESCRIPTOR pfd =
00306         {
00307                 sizeof( PIXELFORMATDESCRIPTOR ),
00308                 1,
00309                 PFD_DRAW_TO_WINDOW | PFD_SUPPORT_OPENGL | PFD_DOUBLEBUFFER,
00310                 PFD_TYPE_RGBA,
00311                 32,
00312                 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0,
00313                 0,
00314                 0,
00315                 0,
00316                 0, 0, 0, 0,
00317                 24,
00318                 0,
00319                 0,
00320                 PFD_MAIN_PLANE,
00321                 0,
00322                 0, 0, 0
00323         };
00324 
00325         _windowDC = GetDC( _window );
00326         int pixelFormat = ChoosePixelFormat( _windowDC, &pfd );
00327         SetPixelFormat( _windowDC, pixelFormat, &pfd );
00328         
00329         _windowRC = wglCreateContext( _windowDC );
00330         wglMakeCurrent( _windowDC, _windowRC );
00331 
00332         ShowWindow( _window, SW_SHOW );
00333 
00334         // initialize the graphics engine.
00335         StartGL( _windowDC );
00336         new RFileMgr( rootPath );
00337         new UExprMgr;
00338         new RRsrcMgr;
00339         new GrSubsys( width, height, false, true );
00340 }

00342 //----------------------------------------------------------
00343 void
00344 Shutdown()
00345 {
00346         delete gGrSubsys;
00347         delete gRRsrcMgr;
00348         delete gUExprMgr;
00349         delete gRFileMgr;
00350         StopGL();
00351 
00352         wglMakeCurrent( NULL, NULL );
00353         wglDeleteContext( _windowRC );
00354         ReleaseDC( _window, _windowDC );
00355         DestroyWindow( _window );
00356         UnregisterClass( WINDOW_CLASS_NAME, _instance );
00357 }

00359 //----------------------------------------------------------
00360 unsigned int
00361 GetKeyFlag( unsigned int virtualKey )
00362 {
00363         // get the keycode from the virtual key passed in.
00364         unsigned int keyCode = 0;
00365         if ( virtualKey == 'W' )
00366                 keyCode = KEY_MOVE_FORWARD;
00367         else if ( virtualKey == 'S' )
00368                 keyCode = KEY_MOVE_BACKWARD;
00369         else if ( virtualKey == 'A' )
00370                 keyCode = KEY_MOVE_LEFT;
00371         else if ( virtualKey == 'D' )
00372                 keyCode = KEY_MOVE_RIGHT;
00373 
00374         // return the keycode.
00375         return keyCode;
00376 }

00380 void
00381 TestHuffman()
00382 {
00383         // do a simple test.
00384 #if 1
00385         {
00386                 UHuffman huffman;
00387                 const char* test = "Testing, 123!  Please work!  Why are there errors being found?  This seems really strange to me.";
00388 //              const char* test = "WTF..!";
00389 
00390                 // compress data.
00391                 unsigned char codeLen[ 256 ];
00392                 unsigned char compressed[ 1024 ];
00393                 unsigned int srcBitLen = huffman.Compress( compressed, codeLen, test, ( unsigned int )strlen( test ) + 1 );
00394 
00395                 // decompress data.
00396                 unsigned char buffer[ 1024 ];
00397                 memset( buffer, 0x1F, 1024 );
00398                 unsigned int testSize = huffman.Decompress( buffer, codeLen, compressed, srcBitLen );
00399                 testSize = testSize;
00400         }
00401 #else
00402         // object used for encoding data.
00403         UHuffman huffman;
00404 
00405         // total size of test data.
00406         unsigned int dataSize = 10 * 1024 * 1024; // 131072;
00407         unsigned int maxValue = 256;
00408 
00409         // allocate space for source and destination data.
00410         unsigned char* src = new unsigned char[ dataSize ];
00411         unsigned char* dst = new unsigned char[ dataSize + dataSize / 10 ];
00412         unsigned char* tmp = new unsigned char[ dataSize + dataSize / 10 ];
00413 
00414         // fill the source with some random data.
00415         PrintF( "Beginning Huffman speed test...\n" );
00416         PrintF( "Building test stream... " );
00417 //      URand random( timeGetTime() );
00418         URand random( 123456789 );
00419         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < dataSize; ++i )
00420         {
00421 #if 1
00422                 src[ i ] = ( unsigned char )( ( random.RandFloat() * random.RandFloat() ) * 255.0f );
00423 #else
00424                 src[ i ] = ( unsigned char )( rand() % 255 );
00425 #endif
00426         }
00427         PrintF( "[done]\n\n" );
00428 
00429         // encode the data.
00430         PrintF( "Encoding data... " );
00431         unsigned int startTime = timeGetTime();
00432 
00433         // compress the data.
00434         unsigned char codeLengths[ 256 ];
00435         unsigned int numBits = huffman.Compress( tmp, codeLengths, src, dataSize );
00436 
00437         // calculate the total time and statistics.
00438         unsigned int endTime = timeGetTime();
00439         unsigned int totalTime = endTime - startTime;
00440         unsigned int compressedSize = ( numBits + 7 ) / 8;
00441         float compressedRatio = ( float )( compressedSize / ( double )dataSize ) * 100.0f;
00442         float encodeMBPerSec = ( float )( ( double )dataSize / ( totalTime / 1000.0 ) / 1048576.0 );
00443         PrintF( "[done]\n" );
00444         PrintF( "  Total time:                  %d\n", totalTime );
00445         PrintF( "  Performance:                 %.2fMB/sec\n", encodeMBPerSec );
00446         PrintF( "  Encoded Size:                %d\n", compressedSize );
00447         PrintF( "  Compression Ratio:   %.2f%%\n\n", compressedRatio );
00448 
00449         // now decode the data.
00450         PrintF( "Decoding data... " );
00451         startTime = timeGetTime();
00452 
00453         // decode the data.
00454         unsigned int repCount = 1;
00455 //      while ( true )
00456         {
00457                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < repCount; ++i )
00458                 {
00459 //                      unsigned int dstLen = huffman.Decompress( dst, codeLengths, tmp, numBits );
00460                         unsigned char* curDst = dst;
00461                         huffman.SetDecompStream( codeLengths, tmp, numBits );
00462                         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < dataSize; ++i )
00463                                 *curDst++ = huffman.ReadValue();
00464                 }
00465         }
00466 
00467         // calculate the total time and statistics.
00468         endTime = timeGetTime();
00469         totalTime = endTime - startTime;
00470         float decodeMBPerSec = ( float )( ( double )( dataSize * repCount ) / ( totalTime / 1000.0 ) / 1048576.0 );
00471         PrintF( "[done]\n" );
00472         PrintF( "  Total time:                  %d\n", totalTime );
00473         PrintF( "  Performance:                 %.2fMB/sec\n\n", decodeMBPerSec );
00474 
00475         // verify the input and the output match up.
00476         PrintF( "Checking data consistancy... " );
00477         bool errorsFound = false;
00478         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < dataSize; ++i )
00479         {
00480                 if ( src[ i ] != dst[ i ] )
00481                 {
00482                         errorsFound = true;
00483                         break;
00484                 }
00485         }
00486 
00487         PrintF( "[done]\n" );
00488         if ( errorsFound )
00489                 PrintF( "  Errors found!\n\n" );
00490         else
00491                 PrintF( "  No errors found.\n\n" );
00492         PrintF( "Compression test compete.\n" );
00493 #endif
00494 }

00522         {
00523                 readBuffer[ i ].buffer = AlignedAlloc( kAlignment, kPageSize );
00524                 readBuffer[ i ].complete = 0;
00525         }
00526

00529

00533                 unsigned int page = ( ( unsigned int )rand() % 1024 );
00534 //              unsigned int page = ( i % 1024 );

00536         }
00537 
00538         // free the read buffers.
00539         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 2048; ++i )
00540                 FS_Wait( &readBuffer[ i ].complete );
00541 
00542         unsigned int total = timeGetTime() - start;
00543         unsigned int totalRead = 65536 * 2048;
00544         float speedMBPerSec = ( float )( ( totalRead / ( total / 1000.0 ) ) / 1048576.0 );
00545         PrintF( "Read speed: %.2f MB/sec\n", speedMBPerSec );
00546 
00547         timeEndPeriod( 1 );
00548 
00549         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 2048; ++i )
00550                 AlignedFree( ( void* )readBuffer[ i ].buffer );
00551

00553         FS_CloseFile( handle );
00554 }

00656 
00657                 // set bits in the image.
00658                 for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < 32; ++y )
00659                 {
00660                         // calculate row start/end.
00661                         unsigned int start = ( unsigned int )Abs( 16 - ( int )y );
00662                         unsigned int end = 32 - start; 
00663                         for ( unsigned int x = start; x < end; ++x )
00664                         {
00665                                 // calculate the bit-index of the current tile.
00666                                 unsigned int xBits = mortonTable[ x ];
00667                                 unsigned int yBits = mortonTable[ y ];
00668                                 unsigned int index = ( yBits + yBits ) | xBits;
00669 
00670                                 // now calculate which bit and DWORD we need to
00671                                 // modify.
00672                                 unsigned int pos = index >> 5;
00673                                 unsigned int bit = index & 31;
00674 
00675                                 // set the bit.
00676                                 tileUseBitmap[ pos ] |= 1 << bit;
00677                         }
00678                 }
00679 /*
00680                 // initialize the tile use bitmap.  Mark the first 256 tiles
00681                 // as used (8 DWORDs) for a 1024 x 1024 usage mask.
00682                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 8; ++i )
00683                         tileUseBitmap[ i ] = ~0;
00684                 for ( unsigned int i = 8; i < tileUseBitmapSize; ++i )
00685                         tileUseBitmap[ i ] = 0;
00686 */
00687                 // open the file that will be our new ubertexture.
00688                 unsigned int fileFlags = FS_FILE_FLAG_CREATE | FS_FILE_FLAG_READ | FS_FILE_FLAG_WRITE |
00689                         FS_FILE_FLAG_USE_DMA;
00690                 void* file = FS_OpenFile( "c:/bin/game/test.ubr", fileFlags );
00691 
00692                 // create the ubertexure.
00693                 GrUTAtlas* atlas = gGrUTLoader->CreateUbertex( file, tileUseBitmap, 0, 0, 0 );
00694                 FS_CloseFile( file );
00695 #endif
00696 #if 0

00699                 void* file = FS_OpenFile( "c:/bin/game/test.ubr", fileFlags );
00700                 GrUTAtlas* atlas = gGrUTLoader->LoadUbertex( file );
00701                 FS_CloseFile( file );

00709                 while ( mipLevel <= 11 )
00710                 {
00711                         for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < mipDim; ++y )
00712                         {

00725                 // do atlas performance timing.
